Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SearchTypes::DBsource
 

Sources of information that can be used when searching.

Bitmask -> only powers of 2 allowed. Currently 8 bits allowed. This will probably be extended to 16 bits.

Dont change the numbering! unless you also change all the users in the user database!

Enumeration values:
NONE 
UNKNOWN 
NAV_TECH 
YELLOW_PAGES 
PAR 
TELE_ATLAS 
MAX_DEFINED 
TEMP_ERROR
